00049 //
00050 // QueryServer
00051 //
00052 // 15 March 2004 -- tds

00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_QUERYSERVER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_QUERYSERVER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/QuerySpec.hpp"
00059 #include "indri/InferenceNetwork.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/DocumentVector.hpp"
00061 #include <vector>
00062 
00063 class QueryServerResponse {
00064 public:
00065   virtual InferenceNetwork::MAllResults& getResults() = 0;
00066 };
00067 
00068 class QueryServerDocumentsResponse {
00069 public:
00070   virtual std::vector<ParsedDocument*>& getResults() = 0;
00071 };
00072 
00073 class QueryServerMetadataResponse {
00074 public:
00075   virtual std::vector<std::string>& getResults() = 0;
00076 };
00077 
00078 class QueryServerVectorsResponse {
00079 public:
00080   virtual std::vector<DocumentVector*>& getResults() = 0;
00081 };
00082 
00083 class QueryServer {
00084 public:
00085   virtual ~QueryServer() {};
00086   virtual QueryServerResponse* runQuery( std::vector<indri::lang::Node*>& roots, int resultsRequested, bool optimize ) = 0;
00087   virtual QueryServerDocumentsResponse* documents( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs ) = 0;
00088   virtual QueryServerMetadataResponse* documentMetadata( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs, const std::string& attributeName ) = 0;
00089 
00090   // terms
00091   virtual INT64 termCount() = 0;
00092   virtual INT64 termCount( int term ) = 0;
00093   virtual INT64 termCount( const std::string& term ) = 0;
00094   virtual INT64 stemCount( const std::string& stem ) = 0;
00095 
00096   virtual std::string termName( int term ) = 0;
00097   virtual int termID( const std::string& term ) = 0;
00098   
00099   // fields
00100   virtual std::vector<std::string> fieldList() = 0;
00101   virtual INT64 termFieldCount( int term, const std::string& field ) = 0;
00102   virtual INT64 termFieldCount( const std::string& term, const std::string& field ) = 0;
00103   virtual INT64 stemFieldCount( const std::string& stem, const std::string& field ) = 0;
00104 
00105   // documents
00106   virtual int documentLength( int documentID ) = 0;
00107   virtual INT64 documentCount() = 0;
00108   virtual INT64 documentCount( const std::string& term ) = 0;
00109   
00110   // document vector
00111   virtual QueryServerVectorsResponse* documentVectors( const std::vector<int>& documentIDs ) = 0;
00112 };
00113 
00114 #endif // INDRI_QUERYSERVER_HPP
